QuestData.Title: Lost and Found
QuestData.Description: Poor Mr. Allerton might yet help us find my brother.$B$B<Leryssa unveils a voluminous book, not unlike an army recruitment ledger.>$B$BI borrowed it, ok? Let's see, does that enlistment card have a date?$B$BWilliam saw Thassarian at the enlistment line. Their entries must be near each other... here it is!$B$BHe was assigned to... Unit S? All the other military units are named after Alliance towns.$B$BWho's in the unit? Where are they deployed? We need rumors. See if the innkeeper's heard anything.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to James Deacon at the inn in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Can't say I can help you friend. But I might know someone who can.
